thread.title: BRIEF-Pfizer: EU Approves Mylotarg With Chemotherapy To Treat Acute Myeloid Leukemia

title: BRIEF-Pfizer: EU Approves Mylotarg With Chemotherapy To Treat Acute Myeloid Leukemia

organizations.name: treat acute myeloid leukemia reuters staff

text:
April 23, 2018 / 11:50 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Pfizer: EU Approves Mylotarg With Chemotherapy To Treat Acute Myeloid Leukemia Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 23 (Reuters) - Pfizer Inc: 
* MYLOTARGâ„¢ APPROVED IN THE EU FOR THE TREATMENT OF PREVIOUSLY UNTREATED, DE NOVO, CD33-POSITIVE ACUTE MYELOID LEUKEMIA IN COMBINATION WITH CHEMOTHERAPY 
* PFIZER - APPROVAL OF MYLOTARG BASED ON DATA FROM INVESTIGATOR-LED, PHASE 3 RANDOMIZED, OPEN-LABEL STUDY IN PREVIOUSLY UNTREATED, DE NOVO PATIENTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
